api_list.name: /categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ali-express1.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ali-express1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /product/{product_id}
/product/{product_id}/feedback/

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Country code. used for local reviews. Use type 'local'

api_list.name: /productsByCategoryV2/{category_id}
/search

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: first item number in case of pagination

api_list.name: /store/{seller_id}/feedback/

required_parameters.name: seller_id
required_parameters.description: Can for example be obtained from a get_prodcut: 'storeModule' > 'sellerAdminSeq'

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Country code. used for local reviews. Use type 'local'

api_list.name: /store/{seller_id}/information

required_parameters.name: seller_id

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ali-express1.p.rapidapi.com/store/get_categories/{store_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ali-express1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /store/get_products_by_categories/

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: Can for example be obtained from get_store_information: 'data' > 'shopInfo' > 'shopId'

required_parameters.name: group_id
required_parameters.description: Can for example be obtained from get_store_information: 'data' > 'shopInfo' > 'shopId'

required_parameters.name: seller_id
required_parameters.description: Can for example be obtained from a get_prodcut: 'storeModule' > 'sellerAdminSeq'

api_list.name: /shipping/{product_id}

optional_parameters.name: min_price
optional_parameters.description:
Product price. 

If not provided, it can happen that extra shipping methods are returned which are not actually offered
